title: A Commentary on the so-called Gospel of Peter
abstractText: The research focussed on the Gospel of Peter. I have prepared a fresh edition and commentary on the text - to be published by OUP. Also I have published a less technical article for the Expository that appeared April 2007. Lastly, I published an article on the relationship between Gospel of Peter and the writings of Justin Martyr in a volume I edited being published by Fortress July 2007.
